additional_information.degree: Candidate for Bachelor of Arts in Computer Science

additional_information.awards: Honors AP Scholar with Distinction (Community Service, Tennis)

details: Worked on the Cloud Service Availability DevOps team

Gained experience with backend AWS infrastructure. Built lambdas in both Clojure and Python, and prototyped a user interface with React to allow the security team to audit and regulate developer access to development tools and platforms
Developed BitBucket repository auditing software in Clojure
Integrated Oracle auditing tool with developer environment credential granting pipeline
Hosting biweekly office hours for computer science majors enrolled in, elective, upper level, Systems Programming
Assisting students in projects to re-write C standard library functions such as fread(3), fwrite(3), mmap(2), malloc(3), and command line tools including a shell, and ls

experience.name: Middlebury College Snow Bowl Ski Patrol

details: Leading a team of ski patrollers to ensure customer safety by providing medical care and safe mountain operations
Professional National Ski Patroller with Emergency Medical Technician (EMT) and Outdoor Emergency Care (OEC) Certifications
Worked with introductory computer science students learning python
Graded over 50 assignments weekly in python providing students with feedback for their development as computer scientists

Independently built Shiny web applications in R to visualize tick population densities and pathogen trends using data collected in Professor David Allen’s lab, and by the National Ecological Observatory Network
Worked to ensure polished demos for the new Middlebury midd.data initiative
Worked 30-40 hours per week, independently preparing gourmet bakery items and lunch foods
